name: Kiwi!
description:
Kiwi! is a small game that I designed in a couple of weeks to satisfy my need to create my own game,(not of some tutorial) although it is only a few minutes of gameplay.

The controls are "W", "A", "D". With the "S" you eat what is in the scope, and with "Esc" you close the game.

That's it, thanks for reading ♡.
